required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Combined Prostate-specific Antigen, Multi-parametric MRI and Targeted Prostate Biopsy for Prostate Cancer Screening
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Study on the Efficiency of Prostate Cancer Screening by the Combination of Serum PSA Assay，Multi-parametric MRI and Targeted Prostate Biopsy Among Males in Nanjing

lead_sponsor.agency: The Affiliated Nanjing Drum Tower Hospital of Nanjing University Medical School

clinical_study.source: The Affiliated Nanjing Drum Tower Hospital of Nanjing University Medical School

brief_summary.textblock: The study aims to investigate the incidence of prostate cancer among males in Nanjing and whether a combination of PSA, multi-parametric MRI and targeted biopsy is a feasible approach for screening prostate cancer in China.

detailed_description.textblock: The investigators are going to collect serum samples and clinical information from men aged ≥50 years taking physical examination in community health service centers in Nanjing. The investigators will propose mpMRI for those with serum PSA ≥4 ng/mL. Transperineal systematic biopsy (TPSB) combined with MRI /ultrasound fusion targeted biopsy (TB) will be offered for those scored ≥3 on the Prostate Imaging-Reporting and Data System Version 2 (PI-RADS v2). TPSB alone will be offered for those scored <3 and serum PSA ≥10 ng/mL. Subjects with serum PSA between 4 ng/mL and 10 ng/mL and PI-RADS score ＜3 points will be referred to follow-up examinations every 6 months.

primary_outcome.description: Incidence of prostate cancer among males ≥50 years old

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with different gleason scores
secondary_outcome.description: Gleason score of prostate cancer patients, Including 7 degrees:3+3=6,3+4=7,4+3=7,4+4=8,4+5=9,5+4=9,5+5=10.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with different clinical stages
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical stage of prostate cancer patients according to the eighth version of American Joint Committee on Cancer(AJCC) guideline for prostate cancer.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with different risk groups
secondary_outcome.description: Devided to three risk groups(high-medium-low) according to D'Amico risk groups of prostate cancer.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with different prognostic stage groups
secondary_outcome.description: Prognostic stage of prostate cancer patients according to the eighth version of American Joint Committee on Cancer(AJCC) guideline for prostate cancer.

arm_group.description: All tested serum PSA. Some conducted mpMRI with/without prostate biopsy under instruction.

intervention.description: Multi-parametric MRI will be suggested for those PSA ≥4 ng/mL, PI-RADS v2 score will be used to evaluate images.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age ≥ 50
- (Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group)ECOG grade: 0-1
- Normal organic function indexes:
- (absolute neutrophil count)ANC ≧1.5×109/L
- (platelet count)PLT ≧100×109/L
- Hb ≧90 g/L
- (total bilirubin)TBIL ≦1.5×ULN
- (aspartate aminotransferase)ALT≦2.5×ULN
- (alanine aminotransferase)AST ≦2.5×ULN
- (blood urea nitrogen)BUN (orUREA) and Cr ≦1.5×ULN
Exclusion Criteria:
- Former serum PSA detection
- Having took Proscar in the past 3 months
- Suffered from any other malignant tumor in the past 5 years
- History of acute urinary retention, acute or chronic bacterial or abacterial prostatitis within 6 weeks or other recent infection of the urinary system
- Having took Proscar in the past 3 months
- Suffered from any other malignant tumor in the past 5 years
- History of acute urinary retention, acute or chronic bacterial or abacterial prostatitis within 6 weeks or other recent infection of the urinary system

eligibility.gender_description: Screening for prostate cancer is conducted only among males

facility.name: Department of Urology, Drum Tower Hospital, Medical School of Nanjing University, Institute of Urology, Nanjing University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The Affiliated Nanjing Drum Tower Hospital of Nanjing University Medical School
responsible_party.investigator_title: Executive officer of Department of Urology, Drum Tower Hospital, Medical School of Nanjing University, Institute of Urology, Nanjing University
